channel.title: Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [SS-94] Start the See Scrum company
item.description: Add all required legal protections. Seek technical and financial backing

item.title: [SS-19] Create a SonarQube project for See Scrum
item.description: Create a SonarQube project and set it up to scan the Git source code repository for See Scrum and generate coding flaws and security issues. Export the data for ingestion and analysis by the See Scrum application.
item.summary: Create a SonarQube project for See Scrum

item.title: [SS-10] Deliver training content, a Scrum blog and "About" info via a Word Press site
item.summary: Deliver training content, a Scrum blog and "About" info via a Word Press site

item.title: [SS-9] Create social media delivery for See Scrum, including YouTube and Vimeo Channels as well as a Facebook page and a Twitter account
item.summary: Create social media delivery for See Scrum, including YouTube and Vimeo Channels as well as a Facebook page and a Twitter account

item.title: [SS-8] Plan, film, and edit Scrum tutorial videos
item.summary: Plan, film, and edit Scrum tutorial videos

item.title: [SS-7] Purchase all computer, audio, and video equipment required for See Scrum
item.summary: Purchase all computer, audio, and video equipment required for See Scrum

item.title: [SS-6] Purchase and install all software needed for See Scrum
item.summary: Purchase and install all software needed for See Scrum

item.title: [SS-5] Ingest data from Jira, Git, and the Retrospective Tool
item.summary: Ingest data from Jira, Git, and the Retrospective Tool

item.title: [SS-4] Analyze the Sprint Backlog data and generate alerts to the Scrum Master for stories which match typical anti-patterns
item.summary: Analyze the Sprint Backlog data and generate alerts to the Scrum Master for stories which match typical anti-patterns

item.title: [SS-3] Create innovative interactive visualizations of Jira and Git data
item.summary: Create innovative interactive visualizations of Jira and Git data

item.title: [SS-2] Create a Git source code repository for See Scrum and extract data from the repository into the See Scrum application
item.summary: Create a Git source code repository for See Scrum and extract data from the repository into the See Scrum application

item.title: [SS-1] Create a Jira project repository for See Scrum and extract data from the repository into the See Scrum application
item.summary: Create a Jira project repository for See Scrum and extract data from the repository into the See Scrum application
